description: Fixed timezone handling in PULL function to use local timezone for user input dates
changes: Fixed timezone issue where input dates were automatically converted to UTC
Updated backend to preserve naive timestamps, allowing Seeq to use workstation timezone
Modified timestamp formatting to preserve local timezone information
Updated frontend documentation to clarify timezone behavior
Now when users input 'Aug 1 2025 00:00' they get data starting at Aug 1 2025 00:00 in their local timezone
Eliminated the 5-hour offset issue that was occurring with UTC conversion
